participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Caring and humorous, enjoys sharing stories and engaging in deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easy-going, loves to chat about everyday life and enjoys discussing pets.
participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.
